text: @Alyssafarah @realDonaldTrump BS. This is always DJT's fallback position. Fire Navarro. Hack. It's a NOVEL Coronavirus. That means "NEW". No doctor or scientist knew how it would behave or how to treat it. They're STILL learning. Navarro's not fit to shine Fauci's shoes. #IStandWithDrFauci
